document_data.mainbody:
huingara Lhoril was an inhabitant of Myth Drannor in the 3 century DR.
She was the lady of house Lhoril.
In , she joined a party at Satyrdance Pool, where she revealed that she feared for the continued existence of Cormanthor. Albeit she was ridiculed at first, her friend group eventually came around, and they agreed on some plan to steer their husbands towards keeping Cormanthor from complete destruction.
